description: Try our easy to follow Penne Alla Norma With Basilico Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Peanut free
name: Penne Alla Norma With Basilico Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 jar Barilla basilico tomato basil sauce

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, boil water and once the water is boiling cook the Penne according to the instructions on the pack.
In the meantime, cut the eggplant into cubes and season with a small amount of salt. Set them aside to release the excess water.
Add the oil in a frying pan and saut√© the onion and garlic. Add the eggplant, Basilico sauce, salt and pepper to the pan and cook for 15 minutes
Once the Penne is cooked al dente, drain, and toss with the sauce. As a finishing touch, add the basil and grated salted ricotta.
